abstract: Andrew Smulian testifies in Manhattan trial of reputed Russian arms trafficker Viktor Bout; Smulian pleaded guilty in 2008 to conspiring with Bout to sell arms and says he now wants assist the prosecutors.
snippet: Andrew Smulian gave testimony in the trial of Viktor Bout, a Russian reputed to be an arms trafficker.
lead_paragraph: Andrew Smulian gave testimony in the trial of Viktor Bout, a Russian reputed to be an arms trafficker.

headline.main: Ex-Associate Testifies Against Reputed Arms Trafficker
headline.print_headline: Ex-Associate Testifies Against Reputed Arms Trafficker
headline.seo: Testimony Against Viktor Bout in Arms Trafficking Case
